task.title: Copy Corpus
task.shortdesc: Copy a corpus to a different project.

taskbody.context: From Project Manager window, with a second Project Manager window open:

step.cmd: Select the corpora you wish to copy in the source Project Manager window.
Using the mouse, drag the corpora over the corpus list of the destination Project Manager window.
step.stepresult: The corpus folders will be copied into the destination project.
